page.title: 15BROOK COTTAGE BRAILSFORD
page.content: On Player Estate, rented by Mr & Mrs Scadding. Run business from home. Produce & sell Jigsaws for home mark- et and export to Calfornia,Australia Sweden, Denmark & Italy. Jigsawa are wooden, made in Luton,& designed for children under 5yrs, schools & the handicapped. Boy 10yrs & girl 7yrs old go to school in Brailsford. Love country life & pets. Boy keen on computers. The area is difficult to visit as there is no public access to the Player Estate. One member of Player family llives at Dam Farm,& James Player lives at Bradley Old Park South. He farms a large acreage,mostly sheep & some arable. Spinneyford Brook runs into Brailsford Brook & there are several pools. There is a fish hatchery owned by a private syndicate.
